info.title: Flickr
info.description: Explore, upload and organize photos on Flickr

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the photo. Optional.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of the photo. May contain some limited HTML. Optional.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A space-seperated list of tags to apply to the photo. Optional.

parameters.name: is_public
parameters.description: Set to 0 for no, 1 for yes. Specifies who can view the photo. Optional.

parameters.name: is_friend
parameters.description: Set to 0 for no, 1 for yes. Specifies who can view the photo. Optional.

parameters.name: is_family
parameters.description: Set to 0 for no, 1 for yes. Specifies who can view the photo. Optional.

parameters.name: safety_level
parameters.description: Set to 1 for Safe, 2 for Moderate, or 3 for Restricted. Optional.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Set to 1 for Photo, 2 for Screenshot, or 3 for Other. Optional.

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.description: Set to 1 to keep the photo in global search results, 2 to hide from public searches. Optional.

parameters.name: async
parameters.description: Flickr can process photos in async mode, for applications that need to post multiple photos and don't want to wait around for each one to complete, leaving a socket connection open the whole time. Set to 1 for async mode, 0 for sync mode.

post.description: Uploads a photo. Uploading apps can call the flickr.people.getUploadStatus method in the regular API to obtain file and bandwidth limits for the user.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: The ID of the photo to replace.

parameters.name: async
parameters.description: Photos may be replaced in async mode, for applications that don't want to wait around for an upload to complete, leaving a socket connection open the whole time. Processing photos asynchronously is recommended. Please consult the documentation for details. Set to 1 for async mode, 0 for sync mode.

post.description: Replaces a photo that has already been uploaded to Flickr. Uploading apps can call the flickr.people.getUploadStatus method in the regular API to obtain file and bandwidth limits for the user.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An optional filter of the results. The following values are valid: friends (Only contacts who are friends, and not family), family (Only contacts who are family, and not friends), both (Only contacts who are both friends and family), neither (Only contacts who are neither friends nor family).

parameters.name: date_lastupload
parameters.description: Limits the resultset to contacts that have uploaded photos since this date. The date should be in the form of a Unix timestamp. The default offset is (1) hour and the maximum (24) hours.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Limit the result set to all contacts or only those who are friends or family. Valid options are: ff (friends and family), all (all your contacts). Default value is "all".

get.description: Return a list of contacts for a user who have recently uploaded photos along with the total count of photos uploaded. This method is still considered experimental. parameters.description: Response format. Accepted values: rest (REST), xmlrpc (XML-RPC), soap (SOAP), soap2 (Alternate SOAP) json (JSON), php_serial (Serialized PHP).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The NSID of the user who's photo to search. If this parameter isn't passed then everybody's public photos will be searched. A value of "me" will search against the calling user's photos for authenticated calls.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of tags. Photos with one or more of the tags listed will be returned. You can exclude results that match a term by prepending it with a - character.

parameters.name: tag_mode
parameters.description: Either 'any' for an OR combination of tags, or 'all' for an AND combination. Defaults to 'any' if not specified.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: A free text search. Photos whose title, description or tags contain the text will be returned. You can exclude results that match a term by prepending it with a - character.

parameters.name: min_upload_date
parameters.description: Minimum upload date. Photos with an upload date greater than or equal to this value will be returned. The date can be in the form of a unix timestamp or mysql datetime.

parameters.name: max_upload_date
parameters.description: Maximum upload date. Photos with an upload date less than or equal to this value will be returned. The date can be in the form of a unix timestamp or mysql datetime.

parameters.name: min_taken_date
parameters.description: Minimum taken date. Photos with an taken date greater than or equal to this value will be returned. The date can be in the form of a mysql datetime or unix timestamp.

parameters.name: max_taken_date
parameters.description: Maximum taken date. Photos with an taken date less than or equal to this value will be returned. The date can be in the form of a mysql datetime or unix timestamp.

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: The license id for photos (for possible values see the flickr.photos.licenses.getInfo method). Multiple licenses may be comma-separated.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order in which to sort returned photos. Deafults to date-posted-desc (unless you are doing a radial geo query, in which case the default sorting is by ascending distance from the point specified). The possible values are: date-posted-asc, date-posted-desc, date-taken-asc, date-taken-desc, interestingness-desc, interestingness-asc, and relevance.

parameters.name: privacy_filter
parameters.description: Return photos only matching a certain privacy level. This only applies when making an authenticated call to view photos you own. Valid values are: 1 (public photos), 2 (private photos visible to friends), 3 (private photos visible to family), 4 (private photos visible to friends and family), 5 (completely private photos)

parameters.name: hbox
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of 4 values defining the Bounding Box of the area that will be searched. See API docs for more info.

parameters.name: accuracy
parameters.description: Recorded accuracy level of the location information. Current range is 1-16: World level is 1, Country is ~3, Region is ~6, City is ~11, Street is ~16. Defaults to maximum value if not specified.

parameters.name: safe_search
parameters.description: Safe search setting. Accepted values: 1 (safe), 2 (moderate), 3 (restricted)

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Content type setting. Accepted values: 1 (photos only), 2 (screenshots only), 3 ('other' only), 4 (photos and screenshots), 5 (screenshots and 'other'), 6 (photos and 'other'), 7 (photos, screenshots, and 'other') (all)

parameters.name: machine_tags
parameters.description: Machine tag(s). See API docs for format. Multiple machine tags may be queried by passing a comma-separated list. The number of machine tags you can pass in a single query depends on the tag mode (AND or OR) that you are querying with. "AND" queries are limited to (16) machine tags. "OR" queries are limited to (8).

parameters.name: machine_tag_mode
parameters.description: Either 'any' for an OR combination of tags, or 'all' for an AND combination. Defaults to 'any' if not specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The id of a group who's pool to search. If specified, only matching photos posted to the group's pool will be returned.

parameters.name: contacts
parameters.description: Search your contacts. Either 'all' or 'ff' for just friends and family. (Experimental)

parameters.name: woe_id
parameters.description: A 32-bit identifier that uniquely represents spatial entities. (not used if bbox argument is present). See API docs for more info.

parameters.name: place_id
parameters.description: A Flickr place id. (not used if bbox argument is present). See API docs for more info.

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: Filter results by media type. Possible values are all (default), photos, videos

parameters.name: has_geo
parameters.description: Any photo that has been geotagged, or if the value is "0" any photo that has not been geotagged. See API docs for more info.

parameters.name: geo_context
parameters.description: Geo context is a numeric value representing the photo's geotagginess beyond latitude and longitude. See API docs for more info. Accepted values: 0 (not defined), 1 (indoors), 2 (outdoors)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: A valid latitude, in decimal format, for doing radial geo queries. See API docs for more info.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: A valid longitude, in decimal format, for doing radial geo queries. See API docs for more info.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: A valid radius used for geo queries, greater than zero and less than 20 miles (or 32 kilometers), for use with point-based geo queries. The default value is 5 (km).

parameters.name: radius_units
parameters.description: The unit of measure when doing radial geo queries. Valid options are "mi" (miles) and "km" (kilometers). The default is "km".

parameters.name: is_commons
parameters.description: Limit the scope of the search to only photos that are part of the Flickr Commons project. Default is false.

parameters.name: is_gallery
parameters.description: Limit the scope of the search to only photos that are in a gallery? Default is false, search all photos.

parameters.name: is_getty
parameters.description: Limit the scope of the search to only photos that are for sale on Getty. Default is false.

parameters.name: extras
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are: description, license, date_upload, date_taken, owner_name, icon_server, original_format, last_update, geo, tags, machine_tags, o_dims, views, media, path_alias, url_sq, url_t, url_s, url_m, url_z, url_l, url_o

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.
